item.title: Jerome Cohen, Lawyer Who Saw a Future in China, Dies at 95
item.description: After pioneering the study of Chinese law in America, he was among the first foreigners to practice commercial law in China, and spoke out about human...

item.title: Iranians Brace for Economic Impact of New U.N. Sanctions
item.description: Already suffering a 40 percent inflation rate and critical shortages of power and water, many in Iran expect conditions to get worse.

item.title: U.S. Ambassador to Israel Is Expected to Make Rare Visit to Egypt
item.description: Ambassador Mike Huckabee is to travel to Cairo for talks that officials said would focus on the Gaza war and tensions between Israel and Egypt.
